title: Gold Axe
summaries: The Gold Axe is an early game axe, being stronger than the Silver or Tungsten Axe, but weaker than the War Axe of the Night or Blood Lust Cluster. It has an alternate ore version, the Platinum Axe, which is somewhat stronger. Like all axes, it is used to cut down trees, cacti, and giant glowing mushrooms.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
